Package game.items

  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    Consumable
    The Consumable interface represents an item that can be consumed by an actor.
    Exchangeable
    The Exchangeable interface represents an entity that can provide a list of available weapons for exchange.
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    FlaskOfCrimsonTears
    An Item that can be consumed to heal the player's hit points Has a limited number of uses before becoming unusable Implements the Resettable interface to allow for resetting the item's usage count
    GoldenRune
    Represents a Golden Rune, which is a consumable item.
    PlayerRuneManager
    The PlayerRuneManager class manages the player's runes, including increasing, decreasing, and resetting them.
    RemembranceOfTheGrafted
    The RemembranceOfTheGrafted class represents a special item called "Remembrance of the Grafted." It is a subclass of the Item class and implements the Exchangeable interface.
    Rune
    A class representing a Rune item in the game, which can be picked up and used as a form of currency.
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    ItemUsage
    An enum representing different capabilities of an Item.
